## delay() function

주어진 `wait` 시간만큼 값을 지연시킵니다.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function delay(wait: number): Promise<void>;
```

## Example

```ts
await delay(1000);
console.log("hello"); // after 1000 milliseconds log hello
```

[Open Source Code](https://github.com/marpple/FxTS/blob/main/src/delay.ts)
